title: TABLE Partisanship is a good predictor

content.prompt: The table above supports which of the following statements about partisanship and the 1984 presidential election?

choices.label: Democrats were more likely to vote their party identification than were Republicans.
The number of strong Democrats was less than the number of strong Republicans.
Independent Democrats and independent Republicans were the two groups most likely to vote for candidates of the other party.
Partisanship was a good predictor of the way a person voted.
Independents were less likely to vote than were party identifiers.

topic.text: 5.1: Voting Rights and Models of Voting Behavior

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
